alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Hocking; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FAIRFIELD, WESTERN HOCKING, SOUTHEASTERN PICKAWAY AND NORTHEASTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Kingston, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Logan, Bremen, Pleasantville, Hide-A-Way Hills, Amanda, Thurston, Stoutsville, Laurelville, Sugar Grove, Adelphi, Tarlton, Fairfield County Airport, US Route 22 at State Route 159, Clearport, North Berne, Buena Vista in Hocking County, Gibisonville, Hideaway Hills and Lake Logan State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
